de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.components.lexer
Class TMQLTokenizer

java.lang.Object
  de.topicmapslab.tmql4j.components.lexer.TMQLTokenizer

public class TMQLTokenizer
extends java.lang.Object

TMQL tokenizer class. String secure tokenizer of TMQL queries, splitting strings by looking for space characters, but protects white spaces as part of string tokens.

Author:
Sven Krosse
